dialogues.text:
Hey... that thing that just appeared, does it mean
I now have three charges?

Affirmative.
The material that appeared after collecting the prism
does not match any previous records.

There you go again... We've seen this before. It’s a
portal. Every time I take a prism, something changes
in the planet's structure. You notice, right?

Don’t overthink it. We’ve done this before, and it
never caused any problems.
